mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT PLAN_DESC FROM SYS_PLANS_LTBL
SELECT TOP 5 * FROM SYS_ACCOUNT_MTBL

SELECT ACCOUNT_CODE, ACCOUNT_NAME, PROPOSAL_NAME, EFF_DATE, AGENT_CODE, SERIAL_NO, ACCTTYPE_CODE, BRANCHES, MEMBERSHIP_CODE, ACCTSTATUS_CODE, MEMSIZE_CODE, PACKAGE_CODE, SETUP_CODE, STREET, CITY_CODE, PROVINCE_CODE, PHONE_NO, FAX_NO, CONTACT_SALUTATION, CONTACT_FNAME, CONTACT_LNAME, CONTACT_MNAME, CONTACT_POSITION, FRANCHISE_DATE, FRANCHISE_EXPIRY, EXTEND60, EXTEND150, INDUSTRY_CODE, MINDUSTRY_CODE, OLD_HMO_CODE, OLD_HMO_EXPIRY, ADD_SALUTATION, ADDRESSEE_FNAME, ADDRESSEE_MNAME, ADDRESSEE_LNAME, ADDRESSEE_POSITION, REQUIRE_REMARKS, WITH_RC, WITH_MASTERLIST, SUBMIT_DATE_ML, WITH_SURVEY_FORM, SUBMIT_DATE_SF, EXTENDED_FROM, EXTENDED_TO, PROGRESS_REM, DATE_CLOSED, WITH_PROPOSAL, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, SOB_APPROVED, MOTHER_CODE, MOTHER_STATUS, PROPOSAL_TYPE, ACCT_CATEGORY, AGENT_REASON, ACCOUNT_DISPLAY, SPLCASEID, ID_TYPE, TRANSMITTAL_TYPE, BILLING_CTR_MO, BILLING_CTR_QTR, BILLING_CTR_SA, BILLING_CTR_AN, Other_Remarks, GRACE_PERIOD, GROUP_TOP, TAG_TOP, DATE_VALIDITY, ENCODE_TYPE, TAG, FOR_RENEWAL, REN_UPDATE_DATE, LOGIN, USER_ASSIGN, TIN_NO, FROM_INTRA, WITH_RSP, VATTYPEID, rowguid, LAST_COVERED_DATE, EMAIL_ADD_1, EMAIL_ADD_2, corr_days FROM SYS_ACCOUNT_MTBL
SELECT [dbo].[ufn_GetAge] (#{birthDate})
{CALL [EMEDICARD_MEMDETAILS_V2]( #{@MemCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR } ) }

select
FROM sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl LEFT JOIN sys_account_mtbl ON sys_account_mtbl.account_code=sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.account_code LEFT JOIN sys_roomrate_mtbl ON sys_roomrate_mtbl.rsproomrate_id=sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.rsproomrate_id LEFT JOIN sys_plan_ltbl ON sys_plan_ltbl.plan_code=sys_roomrate_mtbl.plan_code WHERE sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.PRIN_CODE = #{memberCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.dep_code IS NOT NULL
mapper.sql: sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.prin_code, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.mem_lname, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.mem_fname, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.mem_mi, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.mem_sex, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.eff_date, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.val_date, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.account_code, sys_account_mtbl.account_name, sys_roomrate_mtbl.plan_code, sys_plan_ltbl.plan_desc, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.rsproomrate_id, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.mem_bday, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.stat_rem, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.other_rem, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem2, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem3, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem4, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem5, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem6, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem7, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.mem_type, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.updated_date, 1 AS isprincipal
mapper.select:
select
FROM sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl LEFT JOIN sys_account_mtbl ON sys_account_mtbl.account_code=sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.account_code LEFT JOIN sys_roomrate_mtbl ON sys_roomrate_mtbl.rsproomrate_id=sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.rsproomrate_id LEFT JOIN sys_plan_ltbl ON sys_plan_ltbl.plan_code=sys_roomrate_mtbl.plan_code
WHERE LTRIM(RTRIM(sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.prin_code))= #{memberNumber} AND sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.prin_code IS NOT NULL
mapper.sql: sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.dep_code, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.mem_lname, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.mem_fname, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.mem_mi, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.mem_sex, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.eff_date, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.val_date, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.account_code, sys_account_mtbl.account_name, sys_roomrate_mtbl.plan_code, sys_plan_ltbl.plan_desc, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.rsproomrate_id, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.mem_bday, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.stat_rem, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.other_rem, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem2, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem3, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem4, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem5, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem6, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem7, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.mem_type, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.updated_date, 0 AS isprincipal
mapper.select:
select
FROM sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl LEFT JOIN sys_account_mtbl ON sys_account_mtbl.account_code=sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.account_code LEFT JOIN sys_roomrate_mtbl ON sys_roomrate_mtbl.rsproomrate_id=sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.rsproomrate_id LEFT JOIN sys_plan_ltbl ON sys_plan_ltbl.plan_code=sys_roomrate_mtbl.plan_code WHERE LTRIM(RTRIM(sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.dep_code))=#{memberNumber} AND sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.dep_code IS NOT NULL

--Extracted query of the EMEDICARD_MEMDETAILS_V2 SP Select PRIN_CODE, MEM_LNAME + ', ' + MEM_FNAME as MEM_NAME, CONVERT(CHAR(12), A.MEM_BDAY, 107) as BDAY,
CASE WHEN LEN(A.MEM_BDAY) != 0 THEN dbo.ufn_GetAge(A.MEM_BDAY) ELSE NULL END as AGE, O.MEMCSTAT_DESC as CIVIL_STATUS, MEM_SEX, B.ACCOUNT_NAME, CONVERT(CHAR(12), A.EFF_DATE,107) as EFF_DATE, CONVERT(CHAR(12), A.VAL_DATE,107) as VAL_DATE, D.Plan_Desc, C.DD_Reg_Limits, C.ERC_Limits, A.ID_REM, A.ID_REM2, A.ID_REM3, A.ID_REM4, A.ID_REM5, A.ID_REM6, A.ID_REM7, A.OTHER_REM, case when Mem_OStat_Code = 0 then 'ACTIVE' when Mem_OStat_Code = 1 then 'DISAPPROVED' when Mem_OStat_Code = 2 then 'FOR ENCODING' when Mem_OStat_Code = 3 then 'MEDICAL EVALUATION' when Mem_OStat_Code = 4 then 'ON HOLD' when Mem_OStat_Code = 5 then 'FOR APPROVAL' when Mem_OStat_Code = 9 then 'RESIGNED' when Mem_OStat_Code = 15 then 'CANCELLED' when Mem_OStat_Code = 16 then 'PENDING (E-MEDICARD)' when Mem_OStat_Code = 17 then 'LAPSE (NON RENEW)' when Mem_OStat_Code = 18 then 'FOR REACTIVATION' when Mem_OStat_Code = 20 then 'VERIFY PAYMENT WITH RMD' when Mem_OStat_Code = 21 then 'VERIFY RENEWAL FROM MARKETING / SALES' when Mem_OStat_Code = 22 then 'VERIFY MEMBERSHIP' END as [Mem_OStat_Code] , case when A.MEM_TYPE = 0 then 'PRINCIPAL' when A.MEM_TYPE = 1 then 'QUALIFIED DEPENDENT' when A.MEM_TYPE = 2 then 'EXTENDED DEPENDENT' end as [MEM_TYPE],
A.ACCOUNT_CODE, E.ACCT_TYPE, A.MEM_LNAME, A.MEM_FNAME, A.RSPROOMRATE_ID
from SYS_UWPRINCIPAL_ACTIVE_MTBL A
INNER JOIN SYS_ACCOUNT_MTBL B ON A.ACCOUNT_CODE = B.ACCOUNT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_UWMEMBER_CSTATUS_LTBL O ON A.MEM_CIVILSTAT = O.MEMCSTAT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_ROOMRATE_MTBL C ON A.RSPROOMRATE_ID = C.RSPROOMRATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_PLAN_LTBL D ON C.PLAN_CODE = D.PLAN_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_ACCTTYPE_LTBL E ON E.ACCTTYPE_CODE = B.ACCTTYPE_CODE Where A.PRIN_CODE = #{memCode}
UNION
Select DEP_CODE PRIN_CODE, MEM_LNAME + ', ' + MEM_FNAME + ' ' + MEM_MI as MEM_NAME, [BDAY] = CONVERT(CHAR(12), A.MEM_BDAY, 107), [AGE] = convert(decimal(8,2),CASE WHEN LEN(A.MEM_BDAY) != 0 THEN dbo.ufn_GetAge(A.MEM_BDAY) ELSE NULL END), O.MEMCSTAT_DESC as CIVIL_STATUS, MEM_SEX, B.ACCOUNT_NAME, EFF_DATE = CONVERT(CHAR(12), A.EFF_DATE,107), VAL_DATE = CONVERT(CHAR(12), A.VAL_DATE,107), D.Plan_Desc, C.DD_Reg_Limits, C.ERC_Limits, A.ID_REM, A.ID_REM2, A.ID_REM3, A.ID_REM4, A.ID_REM5, A.ID_REM6, A.ID_REM7, A.OTHER_REM, case when Mem_OStat_Code = 0 then 'ACTIVE' when Mem_OStat_Code = 1 then 'DISAPPROVED' when Mem_OStat_Code = 2 then 'FOR ENCODING' when Mem_OStat_Code = 3 then 'MEDICAL EVALUATION' when Mem_OStat_Code = 4 then 'ON HOLD' when Mem_OStat_Code = 5 then 'FOR APPROVAL' when Mem_OStat_Code = 9 then 'RESIGNED' when Mem_OStat_Code = 15 then 'CANCELLED' when Mem_OStat_Code = 16 then 'PENDING (E-MEDICARD)' when Mem_OStat_Code = 17 then 'LAPSE (NON RENEW)' when Mem_OStat_Code = 18 then 'FOR REACTIVATION' when Mem_OStat_Code = 20 then 'VERIFY PAYMENT WITH RMD' when Mem_OStat_Code = 21 then 'VERIFY RENEWAL FROM MARKETING / SALES' when Mem_OStat_Code = 22 then 'VERIFY MEMBERSHIP' END as [Mem_OStat_Code] , case when A.MEM_TYPE = 0 then 'PRINCIPAL' when A.MEM_TYPE = 1 then 'QUALIFIED DEPENDENT' when A.MEM_TYPE = 2 then 'EXTENDED DEPENDENT' end as [MEM_TYPE], A.ACCOUNT_CODE, E.ACCT_TYPE, A.MEM_LNAME, A.MEM_FNAME, A.RSPROOMRATE_ID
from SYS_UWDEPENDENT_ACTIVE_MTBL A
INNER JOIN SYS_ACCOUNT_MTBL B ON A.ACCOUNT_CODE = B.ACCOUNT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_UWMEMBER_CSTATUS_LTBL O ON A.MEM_CIVILSTAT = O.MEMCSTAT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_ROOMRATE_MTBL C ON A.RSPROOMRATE_ID = C.RSPROOMRATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_PLAN_LTBL D ON C.PLAN_CODE = D.PLAN_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_ACCTTYPE_LTBL E ON E.ACCTTYPE_CODE = B.ACCTTYPE_CODE Where A.DEP_CODE = #{memCode}
SELECT CAST( CASE WHEN EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl WHERE dep_code= #{depMemberCode} COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND PRIN_CODE= #{prin_code} ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS BIT)

SELECT CAST( CASE WHEN EXISTS( SELECT * FROM sobm_notcoveredhosp_ip_d_mtbl WHERE ltrim(rtrim(roomrateid)) = ltrim(rtrim(#{roomRateId})) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND ltrim(rtrim(hospitalcode)) = ltrim(rtrim(#{hospitalCode})) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS ) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS BIT)

SELECT CAST( CASE WHEN EXISTS( SELECT * FROM sobm_notcoveredhosp_op_d_mtbl WHERE ltrim(rtrim(roomrateid)) = ltrim(rtrim(#{roomRateId})) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND ltrim(rtrim(hospitalcode)) = ltrim(rtrim(#{hospitalCode})) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS ) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS BIT)

select sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.prin_code as CODE, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.mem_lname, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.mem_fname, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.mem_mi, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.mem_sex, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.eff_date, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.val_date, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.account_code, sys_account_mtbl.account_name, sys_roomrate_mtbl.plan_code, sys_plan_ltbl.plan_desc, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.rsproomrate_id, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.mem_bday, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.stat_rem, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.other_rem, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem2, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem3, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem4, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem5, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem6, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.id_rem7, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.mem_type, sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.updated_date, 1 AS isprincipal FROM sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl LEFT JOIN sys_account_mtbl ON sys_account_mtbl.account_code=sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.account_code LEFT JOIN sys_roomrate_mtbl ON sys_roomrate_mtbl.rsproomrate_id=sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.rsproomrate_id LEFT JOIN sys_plan_ltbl ON sys_plan_ltbl.plan_code=sys_roomrate_mtbl.plan_code
WHERE LTRIM(RTRIM(sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.prin_code))= #{memberNumber} AND sys_uwprincipal_active_mtbl.prin_code IS NOT NULL
UNION
select sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.dep_code AS CODE, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.mem_lname, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.mem_fname, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.mem_mi, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.mem_sex, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.eff_date, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.val_date, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.account_code, sys_account_mtbl.account_name, sys_roomrate_mtbl.plan_code, sys_plan_ltbl.plan_desc, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.rsproomrate_id, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.mem_bday, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.stat_rem, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.other_rem, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem2, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem3, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem4, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem5, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem6, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.id_rem7, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.mem_type, sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.updated_date, 0 AS isprincipal FROM sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl LEFT JOIN sys_account_mtbl ON sys_account_mtbl.account_code=sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.account_code LEFT JOIN sys_roomrate_mtbl ON sys_roomrate_mtbl.rsproomrate_id=sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.rsproomrate_id LEFT JOIN sys_plan_ltbl ON sys_plan_ltbl.plan_code=sys_roomrate_mtbl.plan_code WHERE LTRIM(RTRIM(sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.dep_code))=#{memberNumber} AND sys_uwdependent_active_mtbl.dep_code IS NOT NULL
SELECT CAST( CASE WHEN EXISTS( select ridercode from sys_uwrider_mtbl WHERE ridercode=1 and membercode = #{membercode} ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS BIT)
SELECT * FROM sobm_notcoveredhosp_ip_d_mtbl WHERE ltrim(rtrim(roomrateid)) = ltrim(rtrim(#{roomRateId})) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
SELECT * FROM sobm_notcoveredhosp_op_d_mtbl WHERE ltrim(rtrim(roomrateid)) = ltrim(rtrim(#{roomRateId})) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
SELECT HospitalCode FROM sobm_notcoveredhosp_ip_d_mtbl WHERE ltrim(rtrim(roomrateid)) = ltrim(rtrim(#{roomRateId})) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
SELECT HospitalCode FROM sobm_notcoveredhosp_op_d_mtbl WHERE ltrim(rtrim(roomrateid)) = ltrim(rtrim(#{roomRateId})) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
SELECT * FROM SYS_UWDEPENDENT_ACTIVE_MTBL WHERE PRIN_CODE = #{memCode}
SELECT * FROM SYS_UWPRINCIPAL_ACTIVE_MTBL WHERE PRIN_CODE = #{memCode}
